data.actual_result: The scroll bar extends below the keyboard, causing results to be hidden while it's up
data.expected_result: When the keyboard is up, the scroll bar should adjust to the new size instead of extending below the keyboard (Like Search correctly does)
data.short_description: Keyboard in Quick Switcher hides results
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Quick Switcher - Search something that will give you enough results to fill up your screen - Scroll down to the bottom of the results and then close your keyboard to observe the results that were hidden
